Articles.Content:
Do you remember when you made YOUR intro to the forums?

If you did make one, post the link here! The memories will sink in! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Here's Mine:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98442-Hello-From-America%21](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98442-Hello-From-America%21)

Oh the memories...

Didn't I have a thing? Yeah, I had a thing.

Here we go: [Forum Veterans (And New Members!) What was your First Post?](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99002-Forum-Veterans-And-New-Members%21-What-was-your-first-post)
